heroSubheading: खजुराहो की शांति का अनुभव करें
heroText: Famous for its UNESCO World Heritage group of temples with exquisite carvings.

sections.royalTownDesc: Capital of the Chandela dynasty; site of famous medieval temples.

sections.practicalTipsDesc: Planning your visit for a smooth experience.

overview: Khajuraho is a famous historic town in the Chhatarpur district of Madhya Pradesh, India.
It is best known for its group of medieval Hindu and Jain temples famous for their stunning architecture.
The temples are recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for their outstanding cultural significance.

city.name: Khajuraho
city.significance: Famous for its UNESCO World Heritage group of temples with exquisite carvings.
city.historicalImportance: Capital of the Chandela dynasty; site of famous medieval temples.

temples.name: Kandariya Mahadev Temple
temples.description: The largest and most ornate Hindu temple in Khajuraho.

rituals.name: Daily Temple Rituals
rituals.description: Morning and evening prayers performed in all major temples.
